PSCT.Base: Equip only to a Link Monster. Once per turn: You can move the equipped monster to a Main Monster Zone it points to on its controller's field. You can send this Equip Card to the GY; destroy 1 card in the same column as the monster that was equipped with this card. You can only use this effect of "Parallel Panzer" once per turn.
